website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight pop up sun shelter is easy to set up and take down, and offers UPF 50 sun protection.
pros: This pop up beach canopy has enough room for two adults and two children
The front ground flap can be closed with velcro to give you and your family a private place to change your clothes
cons: This canopy is not rain or waterproof
The interior height doesn’t seem to be high enough to allow you to sit in a chair

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Fast Set-Up beach tent
customer_reviews.text: We took this to the beach for the weekend and we were able to set it up quickly. My husband set it up in less than 2 minutes and was happy! We left it out on the beach all day and the stakes held it down, even with the afternoon storm that rolled through. The best part are the 3 "windows" you can open for the breeze to flow through so you don't get to hot in the tent. Great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure genius
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot describe how great this thing is. If you burn instantly in the sun like I do, you'll love this. Kept me from becoming a lobster, and cool. It sets up and takes down easily, but practice with it before you use it because it does have a little technique to it. The sand bags are amazing. It held still very well in pretty strong gusts. I'll never use a regular beach umbrella again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Mowry

customer_reviews.title: This says the height is 45 inches, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: This says the height is 45 inches, but it is barely 38. Don't expect to sit in a chair inside this tent unless you are roughly the size of an Oompa-Loompa. I don't know if it was Amazon or Tagvo that blatantly lied on the description, but someone is going to give me my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we got one good use out of this. It set up easily and provided shade. It is easy to carry, very lightweight but yesterday we took to the beach and one of the arms snapped and now it is unusable so we had to throw it away because the return window is closed. I'm not sure if there was a user error but we were opening it according to the instructions and one of the arms was still closed so I thought I was opening it but I guess I opened it the wrong way. Either way, it's pretty cheap to break so easily. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Avalanche Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great little pop up tent/shelter
customer_reviews.text: We love this little tent. Whether it's for going to the beach or letting the kids play in the back yard, this provides a quick shelter for just about any scenario. Be careful setting up in high winds. We used this in 25 mph winds by filling up all the sandbags and keeping plenty of weight on the inside. It helps to have your back to the wind. My main gripe is the stakes that came with the tent are pretty much useless, they come up when you sneeze. Buy some good stakes and you will get much better use out of this tent. I picked up some better ones at Walmart and it made a huge difference!
customer_reviews.author: Summer1108

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, good quality... wish it were taller
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours shopping for the best sun shelter for my big family with small children. I didn't want anything too bulky or too expensive but I didn't want a tiny little umbrella that wouldn't really provide adequate shade. This was a compromise. It works well for us. However, there are times I wish it was just a few inches taller, e.g., if I have a sleeping baby in my arms and I'm trying to put her down, I have to clumsily walk into the tent on my knees. But the dimensions are clearly stated so it's my fault for not realizing how inconvenient the low ceiling could be for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy ...... with a note
customer_reviews.text: Quality and Price is great. Could not be happier with the product and seller. My note is that when you go to pack it up and put it in the bag....be sue to take time to neatly gather it up to make it as small and tightly squeezed together as possible. If you just bunch it up....it will never go back in the carry bag.. With all of the time you same setting it up and taking it down..... the extra care and time taken to neatly gather it up will keep you happy with it....Or use a small bungee cord to wrap it up and though the bag away.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: (XL model) fits 2 adult camp. chairs
customer_reviews.text: arrived today, 7 days after ordering - so much for Prime service.. :-( Tested in our driveway with 2 camp. chairs and two adults sitting inside on them - ok. Can't make too wide movements but conformable enough. Opens fast/easy, closing ok. Like others reported getting it back into the carrying bag is like getting the genie back into the bottle but doable. Will test it over the next weekend at the beach to see how good is protecting from sun/wind. Initial impression - good choice. Thanks for folks that replied.
customer_reviews.author: xyz123

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent!
customer_reviews.text: As described. Pretty easy to sure. (I admit my husband it better at it than me.) but seems to go up easy and come down quickly. great for the beach and other events. Stays up nice and sturdy with wind at the beach and provides lots of room to move around while letting us easily sit in it. WAY better than a beach umbrella. KIDS LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wilson Hassold Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had seen other people with pop up beach tent/cabana. We used it at the beach the other day and it was up in seconds. We had another one but we had to pitch it and put the poles in This was up and I love having the entryway/which you can use in a pinch by attaching it to the front of your cabana and closing it up. So if you go for a walk and want to close it up to keep munchies in they stay. My husband loved it so much he asked why I did not purchase 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up! Less than a minute.
customer_reviews.text: My other beach shelter looks similar, but it has tent poles that have to be assembled and threaded through. Add a tiny bit of wind and it's a royal pain. This one works so well and is super quick and easy to set up. Pull one loop and it's done. It let me get to the beach things I enjoy without wanting to shout obscenities at inanimate objects, unlike my old shelter. Let the kids fill the bags with sand and your new favorite beach shelter isn't going anywhere, even in the wind. It's totally worth every penny of the extra $20 over the cheap one I got from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tent. SO easy to set up and it really does help keep you out of the sun!! We took it to the beach. Pop up and voila. We have a toddler and this was a must have for our beach trip. The clean up is always easy as the material is easy to shake the sand off of and the break down takes less than 1 minute. It fits perfectly back into the bag it comes in. We loved being able to tote this around effortlessly. Fits right into our car trunk or even on the floor by our feet in our sedan.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Great for all day beach use!
customer_reviews.text: We just used the tent this weekend at the beach! It is great! It made shade on some sunny days, and the mesh windows are great to keep you cool! The bag that the tent is held in is not great - two days and there's already a hole in it and the strap separated from the fabric on one side making it no longer usable to hold on your arm. However, the tent itself is great! I, who can't have a lot of sun without burning, was not burnt at all with this! And best of all, when people are having to take down their umbrellas because of the wind, this tent could stay up and keep me shaded!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Sent us older version, with out door!
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the tent I ordered. The description says, "NEW DESIGN FOR PRIVACY FRONT DOOR: Easy to open and close velcro tape front door of the sun shelter, which can protect privacy when you need extra private space, or are away from the tent." Mine doesn't have this feature. We're goibg to the beach in a day and a half. We need to use it for our toddler as soon as we get there. No time to exchange. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MomArtist

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok, but has the potential for 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This was indeed easy to pop up. A little more interesting to pop down. I had to rate it 3 stars because one of the arms broke off after ONLY one use at the beach. I was so disappointed. Especially because it was very useful. I think with it being built for the beach, it should be a bit more durable to withstand the wind that comes that comes with being by the beach waves. Maybe others will have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: starpupil_5

customer_reviews.title: Super easy pop-up shelter
customer_reviews.text: Super easy pop-up shelter. We bought for our dogs for beach outings. We used at the beach on a very windy day. The trick is to load the sand pockets a fast as possible in high winds to help stabilize the shelter. We had this shelter up and secured quickly and it didn't blow away. It is the perfect size for two beach chairs so we may go to a larger size to fit 3 adults and 2 dogs should we need to purchase another. We would recommend this shelter.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer & Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very compact
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tent to have a second larger tent to another tent we have that's very similar but for 1-2 people. This tent folds up just as small even though it's for 3-4 people. The windows are great having it on all three sides as it helps with the wind and keeps the tent from moving when windy. The only thing that I would improve is that the bottom isn't completely water resistant like our first tent, moisture will get thru after sometime, I need to put a tarp down if using for more than an hour
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This was WAY to hot to use at the beach for people. We ended up ony using it once to keep our towels and cooler off the sand. The flooring where it was in the sun was super hot so we had to fold that under. It was also too low to sit down in without crawling into. I noticed a few others at the beach around us and none were being used other than to hold coolers and towels either.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and simple
customer_reviews.text: This beach tent is awesome. We use it in our backyard regularly as some sun protection for the kids. It assembles and disassembles with the pull of a string, which is SO easy and quick. The windows open for a good breeze and I love the ability to Velcro the front flap shut so the kids can nap in some darkness on the go. It’s great quality.
customer_reviews.author: swalke90

customer_reviews.title: Probably was not new. Update 4/18
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the tent, easy to set up and take down. Unfortunately I only got to do this once. As I took it out of the box, it had a red stain on the window panel. Not sure what the substance was or if it was used/ returned originally?? Will be returning Update 4/18. Issue was a restock from amazon. Tagvo had no control over this. Tagvo is a reputable company that stands behind there products, even in this situation. THANKS TAGVO for making this right! The tent seems great, easy to use and well made. Would not hesitate on buying anything from tagvo in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: The price was good and the product was easy to set up but there is really only room for one person and even then I had to put a towel over my legs to protect from the sun. We left it at the beach because it was hard to disassemble and we tore a hole in the fabric the one and only time it was used. I will spend more on the next shelter I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set up/put dpwn
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this tent once set up, however, it was very difficult for me. It broke trying to put down and the company replaced it. I successfully used my replacement 3 times, although it was hard each time, but on the 4th try a leg snapped while putting it dow. Very disappointed because I really liked the design and size.
customer_reviews.author: Joey W

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We originally ordered this tent because of the extended ground cover but we mistakenly received an older version of this tent with no extended cover. We contacted the seller right away and they were happy to provide us with a coupon code for our troubles so we could return and exchange for the correct tent. The new one works great and comes with the extended ground cover, as described. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to put up and take down, just a quick one step process. It is lightweight and easily fits into the carrying bag which has a strap. Very sleek looking and super functional. We have used it at the beach, in the backyard, and we toss it into the trunk to take it on the go and put up quickly to provide shade for my daughter when we are outside. It's big enough for a low beach chair to be entirely covered.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa LaRoche

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for our grandchildren to use during our beach vacation. Had a hard time setting up & taking down following instructions. I was extremely disappointed that one of the mail supports broke within 3 days of use. :(
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as stated!
customer_reviews.text: This is so small... I bought this because of the dimensions, and it did not measure up at all. It wasn't as tall as stated and definitely not large enough to accommodate my little family at the beach for my son's first birthday. I was incredibly disappointed that they item wasn't as described or promised.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Hammon

customer_reviews.title: Great for windy beach days
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beach. We went on a very windy day and had some difficulty setting up at first, but once the stakes were in and the sand bags filled this tent stayed out. Unlike everyone else’s beach umbrella. I’ll never use and umbrella at the beach again. It also folds up nicely and doesn’t take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Best choice
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! I love how lightweight it is yet sturdy because of the attached sand bags. The ventilation is fantastic and keeps my baby cool.
customer_reviews.author: Noelleygirl

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2 adults,  must have
customer_reviews.text: It was super windy at the beach (17 mph) and this tent withstood it even without anyone inside while we swam and got food ! Took 10 seconds to put up and take down. When the sun came out it made a great shade to sit and lay in. Fits 2 adults comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Love

customer_reviews.title: Great sunshade!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were going to a week long softball tournament with our dog and wanted something to offer a shady place to sit while we watched the games. This was the perfect purchase! It's compact and light weight so it traveled well and it was super easy to put up. It offered nice shade and has little windows to offer some cross breeze.
customer_reviews.author: kmthoennes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved the beach trip in gulf shores on shark week - enough room for 2 chairs and sets up goes down super easy - only "tent" ive ever been able to actually put back in the bag - the windows make it awesome for windy days when other peoples were catching and flying away - i had another brand with me too but this was better it was wider and folded up smaller - i will always have this when i go to the beach from now on
customer_reviews.author: Bob Digital

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and simple
customer_reviews.text: I love this pop up tent. Whoever invented this was a genius. It is so simple and works great on the beach. We went on a windy day and the pockets for sand helped hold it down. I highly recommend this tent. Also watching the video and practicing opening and closing it before going to the beach helped.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly2418

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent. A must have for the beach! Easy to assemble and take down.
customer_reviews.author: loge

customer_reviews.title: Great design but broke first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: Has everything I wanted- got here to the beach and the first time I put it up the plastic poles snapped and broke
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: It’s smaller than I was thinking
customer_reviews.text: This really did fold and unfold easy. The only problem that I had with it is it was kind of small. I am 5’9” tall and when I was sitting in a standard camping chair directly in the middle of my head would scrub the top.I could only fit one adult size chair and two small kids size chairs inside and it was really crammed.This would work well if you were using those small low to the ground beach chairs and it was only two people inside.It was really easy to Put up and take down
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Taylor

customer_reviews.title: We got the wrong item
customer_reviews.text: We are so disappointed cause we order it like 2 weeks ago and plan have our beach day by the time it arrive. So our beach day is in 2 days and we got the wrong item today. Instead of the tent we got a regular umbrella!! We are so mad about
customer_reviews.author: Maria Laura

customer_reviews.title: with the flip of a button
customer_reviews.text: It was as easy as opening an automatic umbrella. Very clever design. Compact enough to just toss into the car. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gila

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a good shade for a windy beach
customer_reviews.text: This canopy worked fantastic on the beach. It was windy, but with two adults, we were able to easily pop it up and stake it to the sand. Easy to close the tent too once you practice. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a good shade for a windy beach. It is best to have low beach chairs too as it does not have a lot of height to it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wall

customer_reviews.title: This was such a great purchase! We bought it for a trip to ...
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great purchase! We bought it for a trip to Florida but continue to use it for sports tournaments, playing and even a lemonade stand! It's easy to assemble, even for my 10-year old daughter. It takes a little bit of work to get it back into the storage bag but it's not really a detriment.
customer_reviews.author: MKL

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, great space, windows and side close for privacy
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing, and so easy to set up, I love how I can privately change my toddler and baby duaghters in here because the side velcros i can even get change but it's akward for me since its not very tall lol but i can still do it
customer_reviews.author: Abur8704

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, roomy tent but not safe
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to set up! I was able to set this up in less than a minute, and take it down easily too! I’m so excited to get this bad boy outside. Update: when I took it out into the wild I found the stakes to be flimsy. They bent easily and did not hold the tent in the wind. Will have to buy safer stakes on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight tent for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second tent. Let’s just say my husband didn’t read the instructions on how to put down the tent. He crushed it down like the Hulk. He bought me a new one and he is not allowed to touch it. I found it easy to put up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cargill

customer_reviews.title: Beach vacation
customer_reviews.text: The tent was a good size for the grandkids. It was a little tricky to set up but worked well. I really liked the 3 windows that let air circulate. The tent spikes that come with the tent were kind of wimpy.
customer_reviews.author: likescience

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pop open and close
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick. Easy to pop open and close. Even easy to stuff into the bag. However our biggest complaint is the quality. We have had tents before lasting us a couple years. We live in a beach city and use frequently throughout the year. The fabric of the tent has many holes and just today the strap broke. Although carrying the tent is amazingly light and makes it easy to travel with all our stuff (we have 3 kids and have haul a TON with us). If only the fabric was tougher this would last longer. We purchased in June 2017 and today it is April 2018
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Koutsouros

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach in strong wind.
customer_reviews.text: A little cramped for 2 chairs and a cooler but you can make it work. A smidgen larger would be better. Material is well made but recommend buying 15 in stakes and a mallet for windy days, the stakes they give you are toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kenfcarver

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it...very easy to open...BUT....closing was s different story. There was a customer video...but it didn't show his hands when closing it so it was tough to figure out. Once we got it, it was smooth sailing. It was awesome on a windy beach. Sand pockets worked great. Was able to put a high chair in the center comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works more than perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It’s super easy to assemble and fits 2 adults and a baby perfectly . The windows are great and air can flush from one side to another
customer_reviews.author: Priscila

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light weight tent. Definitely easy to assemble. I do recommend it. Only thing is that the hooks that comes with it, just wished they were a little thicker. Other then that I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Maria Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these with cords.
customer_reviews.text: Really bad product. Probably the worst thing I have purchased on amazon. Don’t buy these with cords. These will always fail. On the first try to pull this up two of the struts came out of the mounts. This was in our house for less than 20 minutes. Should not be able to sell this
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Perfect shade for our family for soccer matches. I put it up and take it down by my self with ease. I take four kids under the age of 6 to soccer and having this has been a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: KateOfSpades

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 1 yr old at the beach! Rain storm came and we closed it and everything stayed dry. I got in the tent with him as well and plenty of room for both of us. Took us at most 5 minutes to set up but that’s just because we missed placed the metal anchors. Holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sun shade! It was perfect at the lake for keeping my 6 month old baby out of the sun and it was nice that there is a “floor” to it so he wasn’t just buried in the sand. It’s very easy to set up and take down and fits well into its case each time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This was a rush buy to replace my broken and tattered 12 year old tent. This is a great value for the price. My 12 year old son easily popped it up and broke it down in seconds. Worth every cent for our remaining beach season.
customer_reviews.author: LVanzie

customer_reviews.title: Very good for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, easy handling. Stakes work in all but high wind. Try using camping stakes for better hold. Height is prohibitive for 6’ers, but works well with low chairs. Quality and sun blocking seem quite good
customer_reviews.author: RevLevo

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I finally found a beach tent that I could easily pop up at the beach alone with a toddler! Taking it down is surprisingly just as easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and carry.
customer_reviews.text: Took it to the beach and I must say it's easy to assemble so you have more time for the fun stuff and when you're ready to relax you've got a nice shade to sit out lay under.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed didn't even set it up one time.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to start this other than what a waste of 70 bucks. After following the directions and having the pivoting mechanism that allows the legs to expand break. I was able to re attach the legs only to have the tent rip. Mind you this was first attempt to set this up. I was excited to get this and have a decent lean to for the beach only to have it completely fail in every way. Never got to enjoy now it's in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Allen

customer_reviews.title: So easy up and down
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something quick and easy because we have few free hands with a 6 month old and a 3 year old. This works perfectly! Easy up and easy down. If you can work an umbrella you can put up this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Two years old and going strong!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our first beach trip after having our daughter. It’s been used on 6 different beach trips, each spanning a week and used everyday. It’s held up so well and used by our whole family. We love it and look forward to our third summer using it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Willingham

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and easy take down
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking this beach tent. It is my first one and I like the easy set up. Just take it out of the bag, lay out the poles (which they pretty much do themselves), then pull strings while holding hub and the tent just pops up. The tent comes with stakes but we just filled the pockets with sand and it did the job and stayed in place. Note: you'll probably take a little sand home with you, since emptying the pockets is a little challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should own this!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best thing ever! We use it all the time! My family likes to put it up in the living room as a fort which I’m so thankful it’s so easy to put up and take down! We take it to the beach all the time too! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Quick setup.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Light weight. Sun shade and privacy on the beach when you need it. The carrying strap is weak and broke the first time I hiked to a beach. I bought some heavy duty Velcro to fix that, otherwise I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas H. Boven

customer_reviews.title: Great beach tent. Very roomy.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Easy to set up. Just wish the carrying bag was a little larger. Hard to get back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this tent. Purchased for a beach trip. It was seriously easy to setup and breakdown. One person can easily do it. It folds similar to an umbrella. Easy to store and easy to carry. I recommend this tent to anyone looking for something spacious and easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: My Hanh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great little shelter for a day at the beach
customer_reviews.text: This shelter was great for a day at the beach. Set up was extremely easy and it provided enough shade for 3 kids ages 5-7. The multiple windows allow for good ventilation as well.
customer_reviews.author: Travis E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach shelter!
customer_reviews.text: I was totally skeptical about this thing truly being a "pop-up", but it is SO easy and fast to put up and take down! Really good quality, and I've put it up probably 5 times so far. No ripping or anything. Very much worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but don't expect long life.
customer_reviews.text: Material is thin. I do not expect it to hold up well. Strap on carrying bag was loose on one end. Had to hand stitch it back on. Does set up and break down easily. Overall, good price for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Haub

customer_reviews.title: Tagvo Pop Up Beach Tent Sun Shelter
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up (less then 3 min), and easy to put it up! Now we really enjoin our day beach trips. we have been used this tent for 4 trips this year. Still harpy.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged - otherwise very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really cool, pops up easily, feels like good quality. Unfortunately it arrived damaged and has ripped fabric. I’m too lazy to order a replacement through amazon, which would require me returning the original. So I’m leaving this review instead.
customer_reviews.author: tim moffat

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the stakes were sewn to the tethers, just because I could see them getting lost easily. Other than that, this was great! I live on the Oregon coast and this put up with a lot of wind and heat. It was a perfect place to nap with my baby on the beach. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: rebeckah o.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent!
customer_reviews.text: Can I just say yes!!!!! Amazing little time for the beach. Loved it! Perfect for every age.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Private, versatile and easy storage!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment for sun protection!!! Versatile and easy to store! Use it frequently when needed at the beach, park, and outdoor events, respectively!!💜
customer_reviews.author: FutureRN

customer_reviews.title: Defective with lots of holes
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and tried setting up right away. It was easy to set up but I noticed immediately there are holes on the fabric all around the top and the sides. Even the carrying bag has a hole too. The holes are small now but it could easily be ripped and become totally useless. I wish I could exchange it but Amazon only has return options. Now I have to look for another one...
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl K

customer_reviews.title: Easy up, and down.
customer_reviews.text: Set up, and breakdown are both quick and easy. I'm 6'3, 230ish, and Beloved is a voluptuous 5' and 1....somthin. We both fit nicely with beach chairs, and a cooler or two.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Lighon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This sun shelter is pretty easy to assemble and disassemble. Only problem I've had is that my dumb self keeps putting my fingers in the way while opening it and I end up pinching a finger!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach tent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect beach tent. Easy to set up. Comes with a storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: NY

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room and easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our trip to the beach. It’s awesome and pretty big. It’s easy to put up and easy to take down...in our case we needed something like this as our entire trip to beach was during a hurricane and stormed all week. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sun Shade!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! We used it at the beach. Easy to assemble, easy to take down and minimal to pack. It works great to stay cool and protect from the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Tancredi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up. Easy to take down. Easy to store. Keeps me from burning up in the sun. Buy yourself one. You’ll love it.
customer_reviews.author: We’veGotSnacksNow

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! We used it at the beach and it was wonderful! Easy to assemble and take apart!
customer_reviews.author: K&K

customer_reviews.title: This is the easiest tent ever made to put up ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest tent ever made to put up. Two hand is all you need. Can't wait to try this out on the beach
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ritenour

customer_reviews.title: Loved this for our family reunion at the beach.
customer_reviews.text: It was very light weight and provided ample shade for the babies in our group. Also provided privacy for nursing. I loved everything about this tent except it was a little tricky to take down. Maybe with practice it will be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Allison

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this tent is the best! We have used it at the beach a few times and it has an easy set up and take down, we fit in it and even the dog likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it but I can't use it on any Beach
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Shank

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy pop-up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for field-side setup to watch soccer games. Very easy setup but requires some assistance of its windy.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble! Make Sure to Moor!
customer_reviews.text: Love how light it is and the carrying case is a breeze-just like the cases for collapsing chairs. Ocean winds will definitely carry the tent off if not moored down correctly and/or weighted inside with coolers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Thwells35

customer_reviews.title: great tent
customer_reviews.text: we took the tint to the beach to protect our 5month old from the sun and it was easy to put up and take down the wind didn't blow it away it was just great
customer_reviews.author: Javalynn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, lightweight and roomy. Love the pockets and "windows." Received lots of compliments on it when I went to Pensacola beach.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used it last weekend at the beach and it worked perfectly. Easy to put up and take down. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HO

customer_reviews.title: ... to put up and down but bigger and I liked all of the windows
customer_reviews.text: A little harder to put up and down but bigger and I liked all of the windows!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Was sent old version.
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy great beach tent. Unfortunately I was sent the older version without the extra groundcover and Amazon had no resolution other than to return for refund. No way to replace with the correct product. Very disappointing because if it had come as advertised it would have been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: the one!
customer_reviews.text: great for the beach. easy to pop up and take down, great fro jet skies to go island hoping and have shade. planning to by another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to use and effective without killing your back to drag something down to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Ripped bag right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This beach tent is perfect...but the bag came ripped. Every other part is great but the bag is not usable which makes the product unusable :(
customer_reviews.author: careylea

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for any outdoor event. It is roomy enough for 3 adults to sit inside. Great for the beach if you dont want to sit right in the sun. If you have little ones you want to shield from the sun. I would recommend this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva Riley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, so much higher quality than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Constance L. Gehrt

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. After using it three times, the top section tore a hole.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: The tent was purchase for a beach vacation. It was perfect for 2 adults. The tent pops open easily. I'm 5ft tall and was able to open the tent as long as I held it high enough. The sandbags were great, easy to reposition when the sun moves. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great beach tent.
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to close, fold up and fit into the travel case at first. But once you get the hang of its not so bad. It opens and sets up in a breeze and there's tons of room inside. I love of compact it is and easy to carry when collapsed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement works great and is easily set up with one set of ...
customer_reviews.text: First one was defective. Replacement works great and is easily set up with one set of hands. Why is the storage bag so small?? Spend more time stuffing it in bag than setting up and taking down.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fresh

product_meta.title: TAGVO Pop Up Beach Tent Sun Shelter with Privacy Front Door Easy Set Up Tear Down, Portable Lightweight Beach Baby Canopy, UPF 50+ Sun Protection Mesh Screen Windows Good Ventilation Sun Shade Tent
feature_bullets: EASY UP & DOWN: this portable pop up beach sun shelter can be incredibly easy to set up and take down in a minute by yourself alone. This easy up canopy tent provides protection from the sun, rain and wind for all outdoor activities, UV 50+ sun protection can resist the UV effectively, and offer you and kids all-day shade on the beach.

COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT: a newer version that is more large, 39.8 * 5.9 inches in portable travel size, and this easy up tent can be folded in carry bag, lightweight only 5.9 lb. Expanding size in 97.6(L) * 49.2(H) * 53.1(Depth)inches large enough for 3-4 people, providing a spacious interior shelter.
NEW DESIGN FOR PRIVACY FRONT DOOR: Easy to open and close velcro tape front door of the sun shelter, which can protect privacy when you need extra private space, or are away from the tent.

GOOD VENTILATION: the instant beach cabana is made from breathable polyester, and designed with 3 large screen windows that provide for a good cross breeze when they are open or can be left shut for additional sun protection.

FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: includes 5pcs sand pockets to provide stability for windy conditions on the beach, 8pcs steel stakes with 4pcs ropes to use on grass and dirt fields, a mesh pockets under the rear window for keeping and easy accessing items like cellphones, keys; a carry bag with user manual sewn on its liner makes this automatic shade tent easy carrying in hand or over shoulder and avoid manual lost.
